Control Name: 5.9.3 Enhanced network visibility is enabled by integrating network logs into a Security information and event management (SIEM) solution or similar technology.
Control Statement: Integrating logs from the network devices, and even raw network traffic itself, will provide greater visibility into potential security threats flowing over the wire.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.9 How have you secured the network of your workload?
control_attributes.Control: 5.9.3 Enhanced network visibility is enabled by integrating network logs into a Security information and event management (SIEM) solution or similar technology.
control_attributes.Description: Integrating logs from the network devices, and even raw network traffic itself, will provide greater visibility into potential security threats flowing over the wire.
